title: Finding Kat
description: Seventeen-year-old Juliette Baycee had it all: a complete family, loving boyfriend, and sister she knew she could always rely on. But then, one by one, she lost it all. It all started on the 3rd of December. At exactly 10.04 p.m., Juliette’s sister, Katarina, went into town, never to be seen again. With no leads and an overwhelming lack of evidence, no one was able to find Katarina. But Juliette couldn’t accept this. With an unlikely ally in the form of high school acquaintance Noah McCallister, Juliette begins to unravel the mystery of Kat’s disappearance. Together, they find clues that Kat left behind specifically for them to find. Slowly, Juliette begins to claim her life back and unravels the mystery that has haunted her family for years. Follow her.  A captivating tale of teenage life, heartbreak and finding yourself against the odds.
author: Charlotte Flagler
